Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 50th overall pick, by New York (A) in 2009...
Injured on 7/5/2011 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 8/24/2013 with a Bruised Finger, out for 3 days...
Injured on 8/25/2015 with a Fractured Hand, out for 6 weeks...
Had first career hit on 8/14/2016, off Ward Winterspring (TOR)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/15/2016, off Derek Holland (CLE)...
Won World Championship with New York (A) in 2016...
Traded from New York (A) to San Diego on 3/2/2017 (Going to SDN: SS D. Robertson, P M. Fulmer, C T. Joseph, LF S. Gutierrez. Going to NYA: P W. Davis, P G. Casiano, C M. Kamps)...
Traded from San Diego to Arizona on 2/12/2019 (Going to ARI: C T. Joseph. Going to SDN: C B. McCann, LF A. Cushing)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/3/2019, hitting .400 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Drove in 8 runs against Los Angeles (N) on 8/4/2019...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles (A) on 10/19/2019...
Won World Championship with Arizona in 2019...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Colorado on 4/8/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/19/2020, hitting .417 with 5 HR, 14 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/5/2021, hitting .385 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles (N) on 7/27/2022...
